name: Dodge (itch) (Ginko)
description:
While learning  GODOT I decided to spice up the Your First Game  tutorial. 

I used this project to learn/test some core concepts of GODOT as well as best practices. 

In this version the score is counted killing the mobs and 3 power up are randomly provided    (extra life, bullets clip and a laser recharge)

  The game keeps track of highest score. Difficulty increase once player reach 100 and 200 points

Source code has been provided for you to play around and make more changes. Have fun and fell free to use all the arts and the catching music :)

MOVEMENTS:

Move Up - W /Up Arrow

Move Down - S/Down Arrow

Move Left - A / Left Arrow

Move Right - D / Right Arrow

Shoot Bullets - Z

Laser - X/Space bar
